name: あにまーじゃん X
summary: In this story, Rumi is kidnapped while walking home from school one day and the player must search for the clues that will reunite the family. Playing the role of the male protagonist or either of Rumi's older sisters, Yumika and Miyabi, you compete against several female mahjong players who have information on Rumi's whereabouts. As they get closer to finding Rumi, Yumika grows increasingly suspicious...
info:
• 别名: animahjong X
  • 平台: PC-98
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1994-09-14
